Hey Jan,

>  WSDL/WADL
> are ok as specifications, but what do you guys think?

I think they are not OK, not at all. WSDL is the poorest excuse for an  
IDL that I have ever encountered, but WADL is equally unnecessary.

You're on the right lines when you say hypermedia will help - media  
types and link relations are the other things you need.

Jim
